description.value: As a a Free Action, the Sister can spend a Fate Point to gain +Insanity Bonus AP to all locations until the end of their next turn, this stacks with Armour AP.

system.benefit: As a a Free Action, the Sister can spend a Fate Point to gain +Insanity Bonus AP to all locations until the end of their next turn, this stacks with Armour AP.

prerequisites.text: Tier 2: Sister of Battle E.Adv, Insanity 20+, Furious Zeal.
